git branch -D defi_poc_v2
git reset --hard HEAD~5 

python3 -m pip uninstall -y micro-llm micro_llm   
python3 -m pip install -e . 

pytest -v
pytest -q  

micro-arc --prompt "flip the grid horizontally" --rails stage11
micro-defi --prompt "deposit 10 ETH into aave" --rails stage11 

python3 - <<'PY'                                               
import micro_llm, inspect, os
print("micro_llm:", micro_llm.__file__)
PY

python3 - <<'PY'                                               
from micro_llm.adapters.arc import ARCAdapter
from micro_llm.adapters.defi import DeFiAdapter
print("ARC ok:", ARCAdapter)
print("DeFi ok:", DeFiAdapter)
PY

python3 - <<'PY'                                               
from micro_llm.pipelines.runner import run_micro
print("runner import OK")                      
PY  

python3 - <<'PY'                                               
from micro_llm.adapters import get_adapter_for_domain
print(type(get_adapter_for_domain("arc")).__name__)
print(type(get_adapter_for_domain("defi")).__name__)
PY
